GIF.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a type of computer file that contains images and is used on the Internet
GIF.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a computer file containing images with up to 256 colours. GIF files are used especially on web sites, but they are not considered suitable for professional printing
GIF.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: A GIF file employs lossless data compression so that the file size of an image may be reduced without degrading the visual quality.
